      • locateConfigureInterface

        public ConfigureInterface locateConfigureInterface(java.lang.String rootDir,
                                          java.lang.String configPath)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigureLocatorInterface
        Attempt to locate DRIVER configuration data.
        Specified by:
        locateConfigureInterface in interface ConfigureLocatorInterface
        Parameters:
        rootDir - -- The rootDir may be a String containing a path to a directory, or to a file, or to some other type of object as needed by the specific implementation.
        configPath - -- The configPath may be a String containing a path to a directory, or to a file, or to some other type of object as needed by the specific implementation.

        The rootDir and configPath may be used in combination to resolve to the ConfigureInterface.

        Returns:
        ConfigureInterface if located, or null if not.
        See Also:
        ConfigureLocatorInterface.locateConfigureInterface(String, String)

      • getExtractionDirectory

        java.io.File getExtractionDirectory()
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Deduce a Temp directory or user-specified extraction directory for JAR extraction.

        The routine will seek the System.getProperty("safs.project.extract") to extract to an alternative directory instead of the Temp directory.

        JVM Arg: -Dsafs.project.extract=<absolute path to extraction directory>

        Returns:
        File pointing to the desired extraction directory.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • extractConfigPath

        public CaseInsensitiveFile extractConfigPath(java.lang.String rootDir,
                                    java.lang.String configPath)
        Extract project and test assets to a Temp directory if embedded inside a JAR file.

        The routine will seek the System.getProperty("safs.project.extract") to extract to an alternative directory instead of the Temp directory.

        All assets should be stored in rootDir that exists in JAR file.
        the ini file (configPath) is a file in that directory.

        Parameters:
        rootDir - - required name of a project root directory to seek in the main class JAR file.
        configPath - -- required name of a config file to seek in the project root directory.
        Returns:
        CaseInsensitiveFile pointing to the newly extracted config file, or null.
        See Also:
        MainClass
